content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab at position(x= unknown)
Consists of lab entity with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) and a chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) and a chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### Pipe system at position(x=10.5, y=13.5)
Consists of pipe group with fluid system 24182 and multiple pipes

### Pipe system at position(x=-8.5, y=22.5)
Consists of pipe group with fluid system 24186 and multiple pipes

### Electricity distribution system
Consists of electricity group with id 15071 and multiple poles

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using entities without fuel
-  Make sure to have sufficient fuel in the inventory before using entities that require fuel
-  Ensure that the entity is fueled before attempting to use it

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Make sure to have sufficient ingredients in the inventory before using entities that require ingredients
-  Ensure that the entity has the required ingredients before attempting to use it

### Errors when placing entities without checking for occupied tiles
-  Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when using pipe system without checking for connections
-  Make sure to connect the pipes correctly before attempting to use the pipe system
-  Ensure that the pipe system is properly connected to the entities that require it

### Errors when using electricity system without checking for connections
-  Make sure to connect the electricity poles correctly before attempting to use the electricity system
-  Ensure that the electricity system is properly connected to the entities that require it
